data.name: Amnesia: Final Revelations
data.detailed_description:
Amnesia: Final Revelations is a several hours long Windows mod for Amnesia: The Dark Descent, with a unique storyline, custom items, custom monsters, custom music, money you can buy extra supplies with, easter eggs, big variation of detailed enviroments and a morality system similiar to Metro: Last Light which will determine the ending of the story.

You will take the role as Lee Hawkins, a young man from Cyprus who goes on a trip to Gothfair Village in hope to solve the mysterious events that has occurred in and around the village. Lee, just like his grandfather, believe the events may have something to do with the remains of the Crusaders influence. Little does he know that this trip will reveal more than he could ever imagine.

This mod is perfect if you: Love stories that builds up overtime, a story with challenging puzzles, and a story with a lot of different enviroments.

This mod is not for you if you: Are impatient, hate puzzles and rather prefer a story that puts you into the action right away.

What you can expect:

- 4-8 hours of gameplay depending on how fast you are.
- A few optional quests and choices that will impact which ending you will get.
- Variation between exploration, puzzle solving, enemie encounters and supernatural events.
- Variation of enviroments, from villages, caves, dungeons, mansions, a ship, warehouse etc.
- You are not alone for once. Interact with NPC's and go up against dangerous antagonists.
- New collectibles to find, such as money you can buy extra supplies with and waxrolls you can use on empty phonographs to gain information.
- Challenging puzzles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz - Low budget CPUs such as Celeron or Duron needs to be at about twice the CPU speed
  • Graphics: Radeon X1000/GF 6 - Integrated graphics and very low budget cards might not work.
  • Storage: 664 MB available space
